plays.text: Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for High Sticking Saku Koivu
Penalty to Andrei Markov 2 minutes for Slashing Marek Svatos
Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for High Sticking Craig Rivet
Penalty to Brett McLean 2 minutes for Tripping Alexei Kovalev
Goal scored by Craig Rivet assisted by Richard Zednik AND Jan Bulis
Penalty to Brett Clark 2 minutes for Hooking Michael Ryder
Penalty to Saku Koivu 2 minutes for Hooking Patrice Brisebois
Penalty to Rob Blake 2 minutes for Holding Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Garth Murray 2 minutes for Interference Brett Clark
Penalty to Craig Rivet 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Radek Bonk 2 minutes for Tripping Brett McLean
Goal scored by Marek Svatos assisted by Joe Sakic AND Karlis Skrastins
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Crosschecking Alex Tanguay
Goal scored by Ian Laperriere assisted by Brad Richardson AND Antti Laaksonen
